humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there are 2 out of 9 positive lymph nodes in the right axillary lymph nodes. This corresponds to N1 based on the AJCC staging system (New Rule 12: N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes). The other lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has 2 out of 9 positive lymph nodes in the right axillary lymph node dissection, with the largest node measuring 1.4 cm and no extranodal extension identified. This corresponds to a pathologic N1 stage.
